hooks.command: file_path=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path // .path'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$'; then npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then black "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.go$'; then gofmt -w "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi
